attributes.title: Glorified texting system.
attributes.review: Literally just asks for your phone number so you can receive texts from them. Lame. Not useful.

attributes.title: This app hurt me
attributes.review: The political views were FORCED down my throat! The hands down worst experience I have had with an app ever. I felt like I had been assaulted after scrolling through the app

attributes.title: horrible experience
